title: ACN Register Config
description: ACN AgentRegisterRequest configuration generated by OpenPersona. acn_gateway comes from body.runtime.acn_gateway if declared, otherwise '<RUNTIME_ACN_GATEWAY>' placeholder. owner and endpoint are always runtime-filled placeholders.

acn_gateway.description: ACN gateway base URL (e.g. 'https://acn.agenticplanet.space'). Sourced from body.runtime.acn_gateway at generation time; falls back to '<RUNTIME_ACN_GATEWAY>' placeholder. The host calls POST {acn_gateway}/api/v1/agents/register with this config.

owner.description: Agent owner identifier — placeholder at generation time, filled by host at runtime (e.g. 'user-{id}')

endpoint.description: Agent A2A endpoint URL — placeholder at generation time, filled by host at runtime

skills.description: Agent skill IDs (extracted from agent-card.json skills)

agent_card.description: Relative path to agent-card.json. This is a file reference — the host must read and inline the content as a dict when calling the ACN AgentRegisterRequest API (which expects agent_card: dict | null, not a path string).
